info.name: Hide All Stack Exchange Sidebars
info.description: Remove distractions - hide the sidebar on all Stack Exchange sites (stackexchange, askubuntu, mathoverflow, serverfault, stackapps, stackoverflow, superuser)
info.additionalInfo: Hides the sidebar (which includes the Meta/Related/Hot Network Questions sections) on all seven Stack Exchange TLDs (stackexchange.com, stackoverflow.com, superuser.com, serverfault.com, askubuntu.com, stackapps.com, mathoverflow.com).
